body.p: Applying profiling colors and styles allows you to customize the Author editing area to mark profiled content so you can instantly spot different variants of the output.

Note that the styling is now applied in the Author editor, the Outline view and DITA Maps Manager view. Also, to help you identify more easily the profiling you want to apply in the current context, the styling is applied in the Edit Profiling Attributes dialog and in the inline form control that allows you to quickly set the profiling attributes.
